contents:
If so, the whole set up looks really huge.The auth...

His resigning the administrator-ship will only mean NullChinChina intends not to be affiliated with PinCong, the anti-CCP forum.

We can not tell if he is against CCP or for CCP. If he develops GEPH to fight CCP's censorship, it would be good news for us. But were he working for CCP, GEPH would be just another honeypot.

Plus, the request of storage access makes GEPH really suspicious.
